name: Mazzie Weaver And The Mystery Of Schtew Bolton
name_original: Mazzie Weaver And The Mystery Of Schtew Bolton
description:
IMPORTANT!!!

Please if there is a black screen please let it load for a couple of seconds and if the seconds are up you may try and click anywhere for the game to register.

If at any moment in the game that you want to quit you may do so following Alt+F4.
